Guide Flavio and driver Moises were excellent

Guide Flavio and driver Moises gave my wife and me an excellent introduction to Rio. Seeing Christ the Redeemer was undoubtedly the highlight for us, as it was the last of the Seven Wonders of the Modern World that we hadn't visited. While his English is not perfect, we didn't have a problem understanding his detailed explanations. Moises did an outstanding job navigating the crazy Carnaval traffic in Rio. I also want to note that Marcelo, the owner of the tour company, was very helpful throughout the process from initial booking until tour delivery, and he took care of every detail. All in all, we would definitely recommend this tour to anyone who wants to learn about this diverse and vibrant city.
